The cost of vehicle tax is very high on some older vehicles, these are the types most people who are caught without tax drive. In my opinion they drive un-taxed due to this cost. Paying either for 6 or 12 months can be a shock to their finances and they'd rather risk it.

I would ask the government to introduce a monthly direct debit option. I feel that this would make it more affordable for those on lower incomes, obviously without any kind of surcharge for using this option.
